column2: Meribor. Live now; make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again.

column1: Our neural pathways have become accustomed to your sensory input patterns.

column2: the chain is forged. The first speech censored

column1: If there's nothing wrong with me... maybe there's something wrong with the universe!
He got turned into a spider and now he has a disease named after him
Laws change depending on who's making them

column2: she is yours. You may find that having is not so pleasing a thing as wanting. This is not logical

column1: Your voice says to go away
column2: but your heart wants me to make you smile!
